name: SlashNext
description: SlashNext allows Polarity users to leverage SlashNext's On-demand Threat Intelligence (OTI) for the analysis of suspicious IPv4 addresses and domains.

options.name: SlashNext OTI API URL
options.description: The base URL for the SlashNext OTI API to include the schema (https://) and port as needed

options.name: Maximum Number of Reports to Return
options.description: Maximum number of reports to return for a given indicator (-1 for all reports).

options.name: Show entities with benign verdict
options.description: If checked, the integration will return results with a "Benign" verdict.

options.name: Show entities that are unrated (No Intel Found)
options.description: If checked, the integration will return results for entities that have no intel found.
